results.title: A different perspective
results.brief_description: ‘I was given a photo pass to the 1994 Big Day Out. From then on, outside my day job I worked as a freelance photographer’. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’.

results.title: Cardin Street
results.brief_description: A little piece of wood tells a whole story about a house, about home, about friendship. A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.

results.title: Screens and screams

results.title: Screens and screams
results.brief_description: Kids’ Own Publishing Partnership will have a series of workshops and resultant exhibition which aims : to promote reading including visual literacy, to engage children in the creative process of working together towards a shared outcome, to produce a number of digital stories, to stimulate publishing in schools beyond the boundaries of the project, to extend children’s experience as readers and writers and illustrators.
results.description: Kids’ Own Publishing Partnership will have a series of workshops and resultant exhibition which aims : to promote reading including visual literacy, to engage children in the creative process of working together towards a shared outcome, to produce a number of digital stories, to stimulate publishing in schools beyond the boundaries of the project, to extend children’s experience as readers and writers and illustrators.
